descs:
This unit takes fixed damage by this Skill's Final Power
- This damage does not Stagger or reduce this unit's HP below 1

data.desc:
[CantDuel]
Ignores the target's Defense Skill
This Skill does not hit an enemy
[EndSkill] Gain [DragonLance]
data.name: Tears of the Tarnished Blood - Inception [始]

data.desc:

This Skill does not hit an enemy

This Skill does not hit an enemy
[EndSkill] Gain [DragonLance]
data.name: Tears of the Tarnished Blood - Inception [始]

data.desc:
This Skill does not consume E.G.O Resources
[CantDuel]
Deal +2% damage for every [DragonLance] on self (max 6%)
Deal +4% damage for every [CondensedBlood] on self (max 20%)
[WhenUse] If main target has 5+ [Burst], Coin Power +1
[WhenUse] At 3+ [CondensedBlood], Atk Weight +1 and Base Power +1
[EndSkill] Remove [DragonLance] and [CondensedBlood] from self, then dies
data.name: Tears of the Tarnished Blood - The End [終]

data.desc:
This Skill does not consume E.G.O Resources
[CantDuel]
Deal +3% damage for every [DragonLance] on self (max 9%)
Deal +6% damage for every [CondensedBlood] on self (max 30%)
[WhenUse] Coin Power +1 for every 5 [Burst] on main target (max 2)
[WhenUse] At 3+ [CondensedBlood], Atk Weight +1 and Base Power +1
- At 4+ [CondensedBlood], Atk Weight +2 and Base Power +2 instead
[EndSkill] Remove [DragonLance] and [CondensedBlood] from self, then dies
data.name: Tears of the Tarnished Blood - The End [終]

data.desc:
This Skill does not consume E.G.O Resources
[CantDuel]
Deal +3% damage for every [DragonLance] on self (max 9%)
Deal +6% damage for every [CondensedBlood] on self (max 30%)
[WhenUse] Coin Power +1 for every 5 [Burst] on main target (max 3)
[WhenUse] At 3+ [CondensedBlood], Atk Weight +1 and Base Power +1
- At 4+ [CondensedBlood], Atk Weight +2 and Base Power +2 instead
- At 5+ [CondensedBlood], Atk Weight +3 and Base Power +3 instead
[EndSkill] Remove [DragonLance] and [CondensedBlood] from self, then dies
data.name: Tears of the Tarnished Blood - The End [終]

passiveList.desc:
If the target is defeated after this unit's Attack or Counter Skills:
- Gain 2 [Agility] next turn (once per turn)
- To all allies, including this unit: next turn, apply 1 DMG Up to the Damage Type & Affinity of the Skill used to activate this effect (once per turn)
- Inflict 1 [Reduction] to all enemies next turn (once per turn)

When this unit dies:
- Apply 1 [ShamrockDamageUp] and [PenetrateDamageUp] to all allies next turn (once per turn)
- Inflict 1 [Reduction] to all enemies next turn (once per turn)
passiveList.name: Crying Tears
